snippet: Mr. Rubin, an innovator in bidding theory who earned 20 national or world team titles, was nicknamed the Beast for the emotional intensity of his play.
abstract: Ira Rubin, champion bridge player, dies at age 82.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Rubin, an innovator in bidding theory who earned 20 national or world team titles, was nicknamed the Beast for the emotional intensity of his play.

headline.seo: Ira Rubin, Bridge Theorist and Champion, Dies at 82
headline.main: Ira Rubin, Champion and the Beast of the Bridge Table, Dies at 82
headline.print_headline: Ira Rubin, 82, Champion and the Beast of the Bridge Table
